Data:
==Applies To ==

* Web Applications

==What to Do==

Disable directory browsing for your application's web directories.

==Why==

Directory browsing allows an attacker to browse your application's directory structure in search of unprotected files and components.

==When==

Disable directory browsing at all times.

==How==

Use the following steps to successfully disable directory browsing:

# **Identify if directory browsing is enabled.** Navigate to your application's directories with a web browser. Identify whether your application's server correctly returns an HTTP error message.
# **Configure the web server to disable directory browsing.** The exact procedures for disabling directory browsing are different for different web servers. Please refer to your web server's documentation for detailed instructions for disabling directory browsing.
